trans-unit.source: Scenario - Retain Control of Documents Stored in SharePoint
trans-unit.target: Scenario - Retain Control of Documents Stored in SharePoint

trans-unit.source: This scenario and supporting user documentation uses Azure Rights Management to ensure that Office documents stored in SharePoint remain under your control by using protected libraries.
trans-unit.target: This scenario and supporting user documentation uses Azure Rights Management to ensure that Office documents stored in SharePoint remain under your control by using protected libraries.

trans-unit.source: For example, the documents are automatically protected from accidental or intended leakage by users and you can block access to content even after it is downloaded or synchronized.
trans-unit.target: For example, the documents are automatically protected from accidental or intended leakage by users and you can block access to content even after it is downloaded or synchronized.

trans-unit.source: The files you want to protect might be for internal collaborating on design documents or plans, or for other deliverables.
trans-unit.target: The files you want to protect might be for internal collaborating on design documents or plans, or for other deliverables.

trans-unit.source: When you configure protected libraries for SharePoint, the Office files stored in them will be protected by Azure Rights Management.
trans-unit.target: When you configure protected libraries for SharePoint, the Office files stored in them will be protected by Azure Rights Management.

trans-unit.source: The instructions are suitable for the following set of circumstances:
trans-unit.target: The instructions are suitable for the following set of circumstances:

trans-unit.source: Employees share and collaborate using Office documents that are on a SharePoint library.
trans-unit.target: Employees share and collaborate using Office documents that are on a SharePoint library.

trans-unit.source: Employees do not need to set or change the permissions that an administrator sets at the library level.
trans-unit.target: Employees do not need to set or change the permissions that an administrator sets at the library level.

trans-unit.source: Employees do not need to share these documents with people outside your organization.
trans-unit.target: Employees do not need to share these documents with people outside your organization.

trans-unit.source: Deployment Instructions
trans-unit.target: Deployment Instructions

trans-unit.source: Make sure that the following requirements and the supporting procedures are in place before you go on to the user documentation.
trans-unit.target: Make sure that the following requirements and the supporting procedures are in place before you go on to the user documentation.

trans-unit.source: Requirements for this Scenario
trans-unit.target: Requirements for this Scenario

trans-unit.source: For this scenario to work, the following must be in place:
trans-unit.target: For this scenario to work, the following must be in place:

trans-unit.source: Check
trans-unit.target: Check

trans-unit.source: Requirement
trans-unit.target: Requirement

trans-unit.source: If you need more information
trans-unit.target: If you need more information

trans-unit.source: You have prepared accounts and groups for Office 365 or Azure Active Directory
trans-unit.target: You have prepared accounts and groups for Office 365 or Azure Active Directory

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Preparing for Azure Rights Management</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Preparing for Azure Rights Management</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: Azure Rights Management is activated
trans-unit.target: Azure Rights Management is activated

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Activating Azure Rights Management</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Activating Azure Rights Management</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: If you will use SharePoint Server: Deploy the RMS connector and configure it for SharePoint
trans-unit.target: If you will use SharePoint Server: Deploy the RMS connector and configure it for SharePoint

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Deploying the Azure Rights Management Connector</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Deploying the Azure Rights Management Connector</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: Configure permissions for the SharePoint site to protect
trans-unit.target: Configure permissions for the SharePoint site to protect

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Manage permissions for a list, library, folder, document, or list item</linkText><title></title></link><html></html><html></html><link><linkText>Apply Information Rights Management to a list or library</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Manage permissions for a list, library, folder, document, or list item</linkText><title></title></link><html></html><html></html><link><linkText>Apply Information Rights Management to a list or library</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: Configure SharePoint for IRM and protected libraries
trans-unit.target: Configure SharePoint for IRM and protected libraries

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Set up Information Rights Management (IRM) in SharePoint admin center</linkText><title></title></link><html></html><html></html><link><linkText>Apply Information Rights Management to a list or library</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Set up Information Rights Management (IRM) in SharePoint admin center</linkText><title></title></link><html></html><html></html><link><linkText>Apply Information Rights Management to a list or library</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: To configure the SharePoint library for IRM settings
trans-unit.target: To configure the SharePoint library for IRM settings

trans-unit.source: After you have configured SharePoint to use the IRM service, navigate to your SharePoint library to protect with Azure RMS.
trans-unit.target: After you have configured SharePoint to use the IRM service, navigate to your SharePoint library to protect with Azure RMS.

trans-unit.source: In the Settings > Information Rights Management (IRM) page for the site , in addition to selecting Restrict permissions on this library on download, and specifying a policy title for administrators and a policy descriptions for users, click SHOW OPTIONS.
trans-unit.target: In the Settings > Information Rights Management (IRM) page for the site , in addition to selecting Restrict permissions on this library on download, and specifying a policy title for administrators and a policy descriptions for users, click SHOW OPTIONS.

trans-unit.source: Select the following:
trans-unit.target: Select the following:

trans-unit.source: Do not allow users to upload documents that do not support IRM
trans-unit.target: Do not allow users to upload documents that do not support IRM

trans-unit.source: Optional: **Allow group protection.
trans-unit.target: Optional: **Allow group protection.

trans-unit.source: Default group** and then specify the name of an additional group that might need to collaborate on documents stored in this library, but outside SharePoint.
trans-unit.target: Default group** and then specify the name of an additional group that might need to collaborate on documents stored in this library, but outside SharePoint.

trans-unit.source: For example, the Sales group has Edit permissions to the site and somebody from this group downloads a document, saves it to disk, and emails it to a co-worker who is not in the Sales group.
trans-unit.target: For example, the Sales group has Edit permissions to the site and somebody from this group downloads a document, saves it to disk, and emails it to a co-worker who is not in the Sales group.

trans-unit.source: If the co-worker is in the group you specify here, she will automatically inherit the same permissions that are configured for the site and be able to edit the document.
trans-unit.target: If the co-worker is in the group you specify here, she will automatically inherit the same permissions that are configured for the site and be able to edit the document.

trans-unit.source: Without this option, only users that have access to the SharePoint library will be able to collaborate on these documents, and only by downloading the documents directly from SharePoint.
trans-unit.target: Without this option, only users that have access to the SharePoint library will be able to collaborate on these documents, and only by downloading the documents directly from SharePoint.

trans-unit.source: In many cases, this restriction is appropriate.
trans-unit.target: In many cases, this restriction is appropriate.

trans-unit.source: User Documentation Instructions
trans-unit.target: User Documentation Instructions

trans-unit.source: There are no procedural instructions to give to users for this scenario because protected libraries require no special action from users.
trans-unit.target: There are no procedural instructions to give to users for this scenario because protected libraries require no special action from users.

trans-unit.source: Documents are automatically protected on download, according to the permissions that a SharePoint administrator sets for the site.
trans-unit.target: Documents are automatically protected on download, according to the permissions that a SharePoint administrator sets for the site.

trans-unit.source: However, inform users about this change so that they know what to expect, and let your help desk know which libraries are protected and how this can restrict the use of the documents.
trans-unit.target: However, inform users about this change so that they know what to expect, and let your help desk know which libraries are protected and how this can restrict the use of the documents.

trans-unit.source: For example, because of current limitations, these documents can be viewed but not edited with mobile devices.
trans-unit.target: For example, because of current limitations, these documents can be viewed but not edited with mobile devices.

trans-unit.source: If you configured the group protection, let users know which groups can access and edit documents outside SharePoint.
trans-unit.target: If you configured the group protection, let users know which groups can access and edit documents outside SharePoint.

trans-unit.source: Using the following template, copy and paste the announcement into a communication for your end users, and make these modifications to reflect your environment:
trans-unit.target: Using the following template, copy and paste the announcement into a communication for your end users, and make these modifications to reflect your environment:

trans-unit.source: Replace each instance of with the name and link of the SharePoint library that you configured for Azure Rights Management.
trans-unit.target: Replace each instance of with the name and link of the SharePoint library that you configured for Azure Rights Management.

trans-unit.source: If this communication is for more than one protected library, change the instructions accordingly.
trans-unit.target: If this communication is for more than one protected library, change the instructions accordingly.

trans-unit.source: If you configured the **Allow group protection.
trans-unit.target: If you configured the **Allow group protection.

trans-unit.source: Default group* option, replace * with name of the group you configured and supply the reason for .
trans-unit.target: Default group* option, replace * with name of the group you configured and supply the reason for .

trans-unit.source: If you did not configure this option, delete this sentence.
trans-unit.target: If you did not configure this option, delete this sentence.

trans-unit.source: Replace with instructions for how your users can contact the help desk, such as a website link, email address, or telephone number.
trans-unit.target: Replace with instructions for how your users can contact the help desk, such as a website link, email address, or telephone number.

trans-unit.source: Make any additional modifications that you want to the announcement, and then send it to these users.
trans-unit.target: Make any additional modifications that you want to the announcement, and then send it to these users.

trans-unit.source: The example documentation shows how this announcement might look for users, after your customizations.
trans-unit.target: The example documentation shows how this announcement might look for users, after your customizations.

trans-unit.source: IT Announcement: Changes to the <name of SharePoint library> site
trans-unit.target: IT Announcement: Changes to the <name of SharePoint library> site

trans-unit.source: The SharePoint site, , is now configured for secure collaboration.
trans-unit.target: The SharePoint site, , is now configured for secure collaboration.

trans-unit.source: Now, only members of the <group name> can open these documents from this site, even if you save them locally or email them to somebody else.
trans-unit.target: Now, only members of the <group name> can open these documents from this site, even if you save them locally or email them to somebody else.

trans-unit.source: The exception is that you can share them with members of the <group name> after you have downloaded the documents, so that <reason why this group has access permissions to collaborate on the files but not by using the SharePoint library>.
trans-unit.target: The exception is that you can share them with members of the <group name> after you have downloaded the documents, so that <reason why this group has access permissions to collaborate on the files but not by using the SharePoint library>.

trans-unit.source: When you edit the files, you see a yellow information banner at the top of the document, to let you know that it has this protection and who can access them.
trans-unit.target: When you edit the files, you see a yellow information banner at the top of the document, to let you know that it has this protection and who can access them.

trans-unit.source: This change helps to keep our company-confidential data safe from people who should not see it.
trans-unit.target: This change helps to keep our company-confidential data safe from people who should not see it.

trans-unit.source: If you use a mobile device to access these protected documents, you can view them but you must use a desktop device to edit them.
trans-unit.target: If you use a mobile device to access these protected documents, you can view them but you must use a desktop device to edit them.

trans-unit.source: You will not be able to upload documents to the <name of SharePoint site> site if they do not support secure collaboration.
trans-unit.target: You will not be able to upload documents to the <name of SharePoint site> site if they do not support secure collaboration.

trans-unit.source: Need help?
trans-unit.target: Need help?

trans-unit.source: Contact the help desk: <contact details>
trans-unit.target: Contact the help desk: <contact details>

trans-unit.source: Example User Documentation
trans-unit.target: Example User Documentation

trans-unit.source: IT Announcement: Changes to the Sales Forecasts and Reports site
trans-unit.target: IT Announcement: Changes to the Sales Forecasts and Reports site

trans-unit.source: The SharePoint site, Sales Forecasts and Reports, is now configured for secure collaboration.
trans-unit.target: The SharePoint site, Sales Forecasts and Reports, is now configured for secure collaboration.

trans-unit.source: Now, only members of our Sales and Marketing team can open these documents from this site, even if you save them locally or email them to somebody else.
trans-unit.target: Now, only members of our Sales and Marketing team can open these documents from this site, even if you save them locally or email them to somebody else.

trans-unit.source: The exception is that you can share them with members of the Finance team after you have downloaded the documents, so that they can extract the monthly forecast figures.
trans-unit.target: The exception is that you can share them with members of the Finance team after you have downloaded the documents, so that they can extract the monthly forecast figures.

trans-unit.source: When you edit the files, you see a yellow information banner at the top of the document, to let you know that it has this protection and who can access them.
trans-unit.target: When you edit the files, you see a yellow information banner at the top of the document, to let you know that it has this protection and who can access them.

trans-unit.source: This change helps to keep our company-confidential data safe from people who should not see it.
trans-unit.target: This change helps to keep our company-confidential data safe from people who should not see it.

trans-unit.source: If you use a mobile device to access these protected documents, you can view them but you must use a desktop device to edit them.
trans-unit.target: If you use a mobile device to access these protected documents, you can view them but you must use a desktop device to edit them.

trans-unit.source: You will not be able to upload documents to the Sales Forecasts and Reports site if they do not support secure collaboration.
trans-unit.target: You will not be able to upload documents to the Sales Forecasts and Reports site if they do not support secure collaboration.

trans-unit.source: Need help?
trans-unit.target: Need help?

trans-unit.source: Contact the help desk: helpdesk@vanarsdelltd.com
trans-unit.target: Contact the help desk: helpdesk@vanarsdelltd.com
